values:
what a superb night...

<lj-cut text="allow me to explain...">allow me to explain my living situation... I live in a house that isn't a house... my house is 5 "studio apartments." 2 of them are in the back of the house and I didn't know those people before I moved in... they share a kitchen and bathroom that are "common areas." in the front is me and my two room mates... I know them we don't call it apartments or common areas we call it our house... we share a kitchen and bathroom also... I tell you this so that you understand this better...

tonight I was informed by one of my roommates that one of the people that lives in the back apartments leaves out bread for a skunk that he says lives under our house... he leaves it there so that it doesn't spray him...

wow...</lj-cut>


also tonight I received a facebook message from a stranger... here is what it says...

<lj-cut text="Some crazy bullshit...">From:	Joseph Busch (Ivy Tech)
To:	Adam Coppess
Subject:	Greetings
Message: Hi my name is Joseph, I am 22 years old from Indiana. I am writing to you for one reason, I am concerned for you and where you will spend Eternity.

When you die....what is out there? What happens at Death. If you die tonite are you 100% sure that you would go to heaven???

Would you like to find out????

Go Here.

http://www.NeedGod.com


Repent and Believe the Gospel.

There is no sin that you have done that can not be forgiven by confessing your sin to the Lord Jesus Christ and putting your faith in Him , He has shed His Blood on the Cross for you in order to deliver you from sin and Hell.

GO TO ...... www.NeedGod.com

To find out more.


my response was this...

will you help me turn to god... I love him but I never realized it... your message changed my life...

this will be fun... I'll keep my livejournal informed...</lj-cut>

-Adam

p.s. www.needgod.com is amazing...

So I went back to Evansville for the first time this last weekend. It was actually pretty decent... I enjoyed myself...

BUT... now I"m feeling kind of sick... I HAVE to get better by Saturday... because I'm not going on tour if I'm sick... and I want to go on tour soooo bad...

lots of rest I guess... I met a girl... she's cute... she's fun... she's coming to stay the night tonight... I'm looking forward to seeing her... hopefully I won't get her sickie...

I played a fantastic show in Evansville... I made money and people liked it and stuff... it's exciting...

need to do laundry and such before work...

IF YOUR LIFE WAS A MOVIE, WHAT WOULD THE SOUNDTRACK BE?

Open your library (iTunes, Winamp, Media Player, iPod, etc)
* Put it on shuffle
* Press play
* For every question, type the song that's playing
* When you go to a new question, press the next button
Don't lie and try to pretend you're cool...


Opening Credits
RAMBO - If Our Leaders are Impotent Only The People Can Rise

Waking Up
That Dog - He's Kissing Christian

First Day at School
Paul Baribeau - Help a Kid Out

Falling in Love
Ryan Harvey - Riding My Bike to Work in The Rain

Fight Song
The Weakerthans - Pamphleteer

Breaking Up
Nas - Smokin'

Prom
The Sissies - 87

Life Is Good
The Buzzcocks - Friend of Mine

Mental Breakdown
The Mountain Goats - You or Your Memory

Driving
Defiance, Ohio - Tanks! Tanks! Tanks!

Flashback
Rosa - Chapel Hill

Getting Back Together
Good Clean Fun - My Best Friends

Wedding
Little Wings - Look at What The Light Did Now

Paying the Dues
The Specials - Monkey Man

The Night Before the War
Crass - Have a Nice Day

Final Battle
Dr. Dre - Bang Bang

Moment of Triumph
Nerf Herder - Jenna Bush Army

Death Scene
Bikini Kill - Jet Ski

Funeral Song
We Got 'Em Goin (featuring Memphis Bleak) - Jay-z and R. Kelly

End Credits
Dressy Bessy - If You Should Try to Kiss Her

so... I had some rum tonight... it was nice... then I realized I was hungry and I thought, "I know, I'll walk down to Kirkwood and get some nachos at La Bamba's..." I got put my jacket on over my hoodie put the hood up and walked outside... I lit a cigarette and started walking... shortly afterwards I realized... it has been raining all day... its raining now... but I'd really like some nachos... so I walked to La Bambas... got some nachos... ate them and walked back... I got back to the house... and realized that I don't think I've ever smoked a cigarette that was that wet... I also realized that I was fucking drenched... it was fun...

also during my walk I decided to make an Livejournal...
